title: Creamy tomato soup
description: This tomato soup recipe is the perfect combination of naughty and nice - it's packed with vegetables but laced with a dash of sherry.This meal, if served as four portions, provides 214kcal, 4g protein, 15g carbohydrate (of which 14g sugars), 14g fat (of which 4.5g saturates), 5g fibre and 1.1g salt per portion.
ingredients: 750g/1½lb ripe plum or vine-ripened tomatoes, roughly chopped
salt and freshly ground black pepper
100ml/3½fl oz single cream or low-fat crème fraîche
crusty bread and butter, to serve
